long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daily Trades Analysis Chrome Extension by AlgoTest

The Daily Trades Analysis Extension by AlgoTest is designed to help traders gain insights into their trading activities with ease. 

Available for both Chrome and Firefox.
This free extension doesn’t require you to be an AlgoTest trader to use it.

Supported Brokers

Currently, this feature is compatible with brokers who provide timely trade files. For now, traders using Zerodha, 5 Paisa, IIFL, or Wisdom as their broker, can use this feature for a breakdown of their trades.
Zerodha (Kite)
5 Paisa
IIFL
Wisdom

Key Features

MTM Graph Generator
Visualise your daily profit and loss with a detailed MTM graph.

Check Out How Your PnL Reacted to Spikes
Understand how your profit and loss (PnL) is impacted by market spikes and fluctuations.

See How Your PnL Reacts to Market Fluctuations
Monitor your PnL as it reacts to injections, spikes, and other market movements.

Instrument-Wise Breakdown
Get a detailed breakdown of your trades by instrument.

Brokerage Details
View the brokerage fees incurred for each trade to assess net profitability.
